name: 6pm -trilogy
description:
In a certain city, in a certain park, there is a a hospital. The hospital's origin is unknown, but it is now run by the self-proclaimed Genius Doctor Agatha, and her young servant assistant Percival.

Between the hours of 7am to 5:59PM, the hospital sees your run-of-the-mill human patients. But come 6PM, a very supernatural cast of clientele arrive...

6PM is a horror comedy visual novel about a genius doctor and her assistant who deal with supernatural cases.
6PM1 was originally released in 2010 and 6PM2 was released in 2011. 6PM -trilogy- was released in 2021, and the expansion released in 2022.

Rated teens+ for mild themes and mild coarse language.

Special features include:

- 3 games in one, plus 6 short bonus stories.

- The ability to swap between old and newly drawn sprites any time you want!!

- Special guest character designs from Lonk, Moekki, Cuppatan, Michi/Viridilly, Riisu/bundayam, Jaimie, Taro and Floreyn!!!
